summary.span: 以静态显示或交互式列表形式呈现项列表。

span.span: Renders a list of items as either a static display or an interactive list.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此控件通过使用设备模板集和内部分页支持模板化呈现。This control supports templated rendering by using device template sets and internal pagination. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [设备筛选概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178620(v=vs.100)) 和 [分页](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/8ss4ds3k(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Device Filtering Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178620(v=vs.100)) and [Pagination](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/8ss4ds3k(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示数组如何绑定和填充 。The following code example demonstrates how an array binds and fills a . 请注意，您可以通过编程方式设置 对象的和 属性 。Notice that you can programmatically set the and properties of the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileListSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileListSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileListSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileListSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在目标设备允许的位置，可以将列表项与项目符号或编号修饰。Where the target device permits, list items can be undecorated, or decorated with bullets or numbers. 枚举具有以下值：The enumeration has the following values: |名称Name|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| ||无修饰。No decoration.| ||列表项使用项目符号进行修饰。List items are decorated with a bullet.| ||列表项使用数字进行修饰。List items are decorated with a number.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性将 列表更改为编号列表。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to change the list to a numbered list. 该属性在方法的最后一行中设置 `Page_Load` 。The property is set in the last line of the `Page_Load` method. 此示例摘自一个更大的 概述示例。This example is part of a larger example for the overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用模板呈现列表时，将 通过 ASP.NET 的事件冒泡机制调用事件处理程序。When you render a list by using templates, the event handler is called through the event-bubbling mechanism of ASP.NET. 向事件处理程序传递一个类型为的参数 ，该参数包含有关源项和 生成事件的控件的属性的信息。The event handler is passed an argument of type , which contains information about the source item and the property of the control that generated the event. 这允许您呈现具有多个关联交互的单个列表项。This allows you to render a single list item with multiple associated interactions. 默认呈现时，控件提供了一个 (UI) 的基本用户界面，该用户界面允许用户单击列表项。On default rendering, the control provides a basic user interface (UI) that allows the user to click list items. 在回发时， 使用类型为的参数调用事件处理程序 ，该参数包含有关源项的信息。On postback, the event handler is called with an argument of type , which contains information about the source item. 此对象的属性为 `null` 。The property of this object is `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件来调用一个方法，该方法更改列表中某一项的状态并重新计算状态总计。The following code example shows how to use the event to call a method that changes the status of an item in the list and recalculates the status totals. 此示例摘自一个更大的 概述示例。This example is part of a larger example for the overview. [!code-csharp[MobileListSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileListSample/cs/Default.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[MobileListSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileListSample/vb/Default.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建和数据绑定中的项时，此事件处理程序将从任意表达式设置列表项的属性。When an item in a is created and data-bound, this event handler sets the properties of the list item from arbitrary expressions. 中的项 的类型为 。An item in a is of type . 当绑定每个数据源项时，将引发此事件。This event is raised as each data source item is bound. 这是 通过使用或属性对集合中的项进行筛选或分组的最佳 时间 。This is the best time to filter or group items in the collection, by using the or Property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件获取列表的状态设置的起始总计。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to get the starting totals of status settings for the list. 此代码是概述的一个更大示例的一部分 。This code is part of a larger example for the overview. [!code-csharp[MobileListSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileListSample/cs/Default.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[MobileListSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileListSample/vb/Default.aspx#4)]

span.span: if items in the list are to be treated as hyperlinks; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性的值为 `true` ，则使用属性的值 来显示超链接的文本，并 使用属性来指定目标 URL。If the value of this property is `true`, the value of the property is used to display the text of the hyperlink, and the property is used to specify the target URL. 不会为这些链接生成命令事件。Command events will not be generated for these links. 因此，当 属性设置为时 `true` ，不会 调用方法，因为将通过 HTTP 调用加载新页。Thus, when the property is set to `true`, an method will not be called because a new page will be loaded through an HTTP call.
